SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Activity
Task class for activity object: Each activity is created at a specific date, and can only be modified at that date, can only be related to one task recorded at the same date.
CalendarPane
calendarPane class for calendar view, allow user to navigate between months show required month calendar in the left side of UI
Event
Abstract class for Event object: task, goal and activity; each event has a name, status, date, ID and type.
EventDialog
 
EventManagement
Class implements interface EventManager for Event objects management functions: overloads and overrides createEvent, deleteEvent and modifyEvent methods from interface.
EventManager
Interface for Event objects: task, goal and activity; including: createEvent methods overloads for creating new objects event specific parameters; deleteEvent methods overloads for deleting new objects event specific parameters; modifyEvent methods overloads for modifying new objects event specific parameters.
Goal
Goal class for goal object: Each goal has a deadline, and can be marked as completed before the deadline.
GoalPane
GoalPane class for goal view in the right side Tab of the UI
Main
Main class for the planner application TabPane: Task, Goal SplistPane: Calendar, TabPane(Task/Goal)
SQLiteDB
 
Task
Task class for task object: Each task is created at a specific date, and can only be modified at that date, can only be related to one activity recorded at the same date.
TaskPane
TaskPane class for goal view in the right side Tab of the UI
